questions.question: A trapezoidal plate has the dimensions a = 2.5 m, b = 7.2 m, h = 2.4 m. The smaller edge of trapezoidal plate is aligned with the free surface of the water. Find the position of centre of pressure. Refer figure in the simulator.

A trapezoidal plate has the dimensions a = 2.5 m, b = 6.5 m, h = 3.8 m. The smaller edge of trapezoidal plate is aligned with the free surface of the water. Find the position of centre of pressure. Refer figure in the simulator.
